Name: Strings of Divinity | The Spell Plague
About the game: Strings of Divinity | The Spell Plague is an open-world 2d RPG with turn based combat, where magic is corrupted and hurts those that use it. You must strategize your attacks, counter the enemy, or just run if you can. Save the world from the 7 tyrant dragons with a friendly little companion, spend your time doing sidequests or grinding for better loot, or just meet new people!
